title: Jesus Prayer Rosary
description: A contemplative rosary focusing on the Jesus Prayer

cross.title: At the Cross
cross.content: In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

firstLargeBead.title: Opening Prayer
firstLargeBead.content: Lord Jesus Christ, Son of God, have mercy on me, a sinner.

secondLargeBead.title: Glory Be
secondLargeBead.content: Glory be to the Father, and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit. As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be, world without end. Amen.

largeBead.title: Mystery
largeBead.content: We contemplate the Word becoming flesh and dwelling among us, full of grace and truth.

refrain.content: Lord Jesus Christ, Son of God, have mercy on me, a sinner.

largeBead.title: Mystery
largeBead.content: We remember Christ's baptism, when the heavens opened and the Father declared: This is my beloved Son.

refrain.content: Lord Jesus Christ, Son of God, have mercy on me, a sinner.

largeBead.title: Mystery
largeBead.content: We behold Christ transfigured in glory, revealing His divine nature to Peter, James, and John.

refrain.content: Lord Jesus Christ, Son of God, have mercy on me, a sinner.

largeBead.title: Mystery
largeBead.content: We stand at the foot of the cross, where Christ gave His life for the salvation of the world.

refrain.content: Lord Jesus Christ, Son of God, have mercy on me, a sinner.

largeBead.title: Mystery
largeBead.content: We rejoice in Christ's victory over death, as He rose from the grave on the third day.

refrain.content: Lord Jesus Christ, Son of God, have mercy on me, a sinner.
